email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

I hope this message finds you well. We are looking to ship 50,000MT of coal from Richards Bay to Qingdao under CIF terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote?

Best regards,
Emily Clark
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your inquiry. We can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, which has a DWT of 180,000 and LOA of 290m. Our initial freight quote is $25 per metric ton on a CIF basis. The laycan dates are flexible, starting from 2023-10-01 to 2023-10-15.

Please let us know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Michael Lee
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Rate Negotiation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for the prompt response. The rate of $25/MT is slightly higher than our budget. Given the volume of 50,000MT, could you consider revising the rate to $23/MT?

Looking forward to your reply.

Best regards,
Emily Clark
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Revised Quote
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your feedback. Considering the volume, we can revise the freight quote to $23.50 per metric ton. The laycan remains the same, and the demurrage rate is $12,000 per day.

Please confirm if this meets your requirements.

Best regards,
Michael Lee
Cargo Charterers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Dear Michael,

Thank you for the revised quote. We accept the rate of $23.50/MT and the laycan dates. Please proceed with the necessary arrangements.

Best regards,
Emily Clark
Ocean Freight Brokers

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry: Coal Shipment from Richards Bay to Qingdao - Confirmation
email_chain.body:
Hi Emily,

Thank you for your confirmation. We will proceed with the arrangements and keep you updated on the progress.

Looking forward to a successful shipment.

Best regards,
Michael Lee
Cargo Charterers
